EmailTemplate.name: FindingConfirmationEmail
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Submitting Your Findings
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Finding__c.Contact__c}, Thank you for submitting your findings for Complaint {!Finding__c.Complaint__c}. Attached is a copy for your records. We appreciate your continued support. Please feel free to contact complaints@calepa.ca.gov with any questions. Sincerely,
California Environmental Protection Agency
